item.description: Scores of claims are expected to arise out of the Trump administration’s crackdown on illegal immigration. Experts say suing the government will be to...

item.title: What Democrats are demanding in exchange for funding ICE
item.description: Republicans have criticized Democrats’ proposals as “a ridiculous Christmas list” but say they’re willing to negotiate.

item.title: They ushered their states through covid. Now they want to lead them.
item.description: Why doctors who led the pandemic response in their states are running for office.

item.title: Trump launches TrumpRx.gov, branding his push to lower prescription prices
item.description: The president has argued his drug-pricing initiative ‘should win us the midterms.’ Experts say its impact could be positive but limited.
